scripts.clean: bundle exec jekyll clean && rm -rf assets/resized
scripts.dev: webpack --mode=development && bundle exec jekyll build && npm run replace-images && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build: webpack --mode=production && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.postbuild: npm run replace-images && npm run create-track-archives && npm run link-tracks
scripts.replace-images: rm -r _site/*/assets/images && cp assets/images/favicon.png _site/assets/images/ && rm -rf _site/assets/resized || true && cp -r assets/resized _site/assets/resized
scripts.create-track-archives: for dir in assets/tracks/*; do `find $dir/ -name '*lowres.gpx' -printf '%f\0' | tar -czf _site/$dir/lowres.tar.gz -C $dir/ --null --files-from -`; done && rm _site/assets/tracks/*/*lowres.gpx
scripts.update: npm update --save && npm outdated && gem update bundler && bundler update && echo to update node, manually run: nvm install node and remember to update github workflow
